Ipswich Mobile Library Route 1

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Route timetable

MIP/1D Bucklesham The Shannon 1125 – 1150
MIP/1E Kirton Weir Place 1200 – 1215
MIP/1F Kirton The Green 1220 – 1235
MIP/1G Kirton Gray’s Orchard 1345 – 1415
MIP/1I Trimley St Martin Reeve Lodge 1430 – 1455
MIP/1J Trimley St Mary Stennett’s Close 1500 – 1520
MIP/1K Trimley St Mary New Road 1525 – 1540
MIP/1L Trimley St Mary Faulkener’s Way 1545 – 1625

2017: 10 January
